quote: There is no rest for the person who has envy, and there is no love for the person who has bad manners.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Fear only the will of God and you will have no cause to fear anyone else.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Try not to resist the changes that come your way. Instead let life live through you. And do not worry that your life is turning upside down. How do you know that the side you are used to is better than the one to come?
author: Rumi

quote: Avoid Popularity If You Would Have Peace.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Life is a gamble. You can get hurt, but people die in plane crashes, lose their arms and legs in car accidents; people die every day. Same with fighters: some die, some get hurt, some go on. You just don't let yourself believe it will happen to you.
author: Muhammad Ali
